channel.title: Michael Jai White on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Michael Jai White on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Trouble Man’ Review: Michael Jai White Is Superfine to the Ladies and Super-Harsh to Baddies in a Fun, Disposable Action Throwback
item.description: Michael Jai White has been in a lot of film and TV projects over the last 35 years or so. But probably most beloved amongst his fans is “Black Dynamite,” the 2009 sendup of 1970s blaxploitation movies
